camera_gear.model: Fujifilm GFX 100S / Sony A7R IV / Canon EOS R5
camera_gear.lens: Standard Wide-Angle 35mm f/1.4 GM / 45mm f/2.8 TS-E (minimal shift) / GF 45mm f/2.8
camera_gear.sensor: Medium Format 102MP BSI CMOS / Full-frame 61MP back-illuminated
camera_gear.aperture: f/5.6 - f/8.0 (deep depth of field for urban context)

lighting_setup.weather: Heavy overcast with ground fog/haze, post-rain wet pavement conditions
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Diffused zenith skylight, soft top-down illumination with no hard shadows
lighting_setup.quality: Ultra-soft, atmospheric, low-contrast diffused light, misty atmospheric perspective creating depth layers
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Subtle warm interior glow from building apertures, street lamp halos diffused by fog, vehicle headlights creating soft streaks on wet asphalt

color_grading.palette: Desaturated cool-gray dominant with monochromatic tendencies, subtle warm amber accent from interior lighting , muted greens in foliage, steel blue-gray sky
color_grading.saturation: Low saturation (60-70%), chromatic reduction for cinematic realism, selective desaturation on background buildings while preserving slight warmth on subject architecture
color_grading.contrast: Very low contrast, lifted blacks (crushed blacks avoided), flattened tonal curve for matte cinematic look, reduced clarity for atmospheric softness

texture_quality.details: Wet asphalt reflecting light, fog particles in atmosphere, soft tree foliage detail, architectural glazing reflections, subtle vehicle motion blur
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear glass with rain droplets, Locally polished wet asphalt with specular reflections, dense urban foliage in mist, concrete or stone pedestrian areas

composition_guide.type: Eye-level street photography perspective, environmental wide shot placing architecture within urban context, layered depth (foreground traffic, midground architecture)

atmosphere.mood: Cinematic urban melancholy, mysterious and contemplative, sophisticated metropolitan solitude, quiet drama in everyday cityscape
atmosphere.feeling: Atmospheric depth and urban narrative, suspended time quality, contemplative observation of modern architecture within historic/dense urban fabric, quiet luxury of space

technical_quality.post_processing: Atmospheric haze enhancement, lifted blacks for matte film look, clarity reduction for softness, cinematic color grading with teal-shadows and subtle warm highlights, perspective correction for building horizontals, subtle grain addition for texture, reflection enhancement on wet ground
technical_quality.white_balance: Cool shifted to 6500-7000K with magenta tint reduction, creating blue-gray cast typical of overcast/fog conditions
technical_quality.tone: Log-like tonal curve with compressed highlights and lifted shadows (flattened S-curve), high dynamic range preservation, matte finish avoiding pure blacks or whites
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain open atmospheric feel, possible slight edge darkening only to draw eye to center
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range capture (14+ stops) preserving detail in bright foggy sky and simultaneously in shadowed building undersides and tree canopies
